Description:
Detects the deletion of all backups or system state backups via "wbadmin.exe".
This technique is used by numerous ransomware families and actors.
This may only be successful on server platforms that have Windows Backup enabled.


Author: frack113, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: All Backups Deleted Via Wbadmin.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\wbadmin.exe' and original_file_name = 'wbadmin.exe') and ((command like '%delete%' and command like '%backup%') and command like '%keepversions:0%'))
